message.body: (01/03) Been desperately waiting for you to call. Should I stop? I know you broke up with me so you wouldn't have to worry about talking, but even if you don't
(02/03) need it, I still need to hear your voice. If that's out of bounds then maybe I need boundaries. Just still trying to work through so much confusion and
(03/03) have nobody to help with that.
I'll call later today, Tim. Are you parents there?
Yeah so I don't know if I'll be able to talk. They're here til Monday. And I hate that you call me Tim
I know how painful this is, I really really do. I'm sorry to hurt you. What would you like me to call you?
Me too Mattie. It just feels so formal and distant when you call me that and that makes me feel sick
Ok, I hear that. I don't mean to be nor want to be formal or distant.
As a friend, Please respect the decision I made. I want to be close to you, but need to feel like we can move forward as friends not try to recapture something that had fallen away.
Are you free late tonight or early tomorrow? Or would you rather not talk?
I'm going out with Alice tonight and work tomorrow early. I do want to talk, though. Especially if it would help you. Late Monday?
I guess it'll have to be that. Have fun
Don't make me out to be negligent please. I've been so busy and dealing with this as best I can. You've had stuff going on too. I can't keep feeling like a sociopath for this. It's not fair.
(01/02) I know you've been busy, I honestly understand. I'm not trying to make you feel bad at all. It just hurts so much to feel like you're not going as crazy
(02/02) as I am. I feel sociopathic. I'm sorry. I want to let you deal with this however you need to.
